explanation: [0-0] A fluffy white Persian cat is comfortably lying on a wooden cat climbing frame, with a mobile phone next to it. The background is a white wall with sockets and wooden flooring.

[0-2] Then, the cat raises its head slightly, looking curiously ahead. Subsequently, a woman with a ponytail, wearing a white sweatshirt, pink pants, and white socks, walks up to the cat, squats down, and picks up the mobile phone. She looks at a picture of a dog on the phone.

[0-2] Then, the cat raises its head slightly, looking curiously ahead. Subsequently, a woman with a ponytail, wearing a white sweatshirt, pink pants, and white socks, walks up to the cat, squats down, and picks up the mobile phone. She looks at a picture of a dog on the phone.

[2-4] Afterward, the woman pulls open a pink backdrop from a black shelf in the room to set up a photography studio for the cat. A black and white cat appears, lying lazily on the backdrop with the white cat. The woman brings a small pink chair.

[2-4] Afterward, the woman pulls open a pink backdrop from a black shelf in the room to set up a photography studio for the cat. A black and white cat appears, lying lazily on the backdrop with the white cat. The woman brings a small pink chair.

[4-8] Next, the scene switches to a pink background, where a white cat stands elegantly in the center of the screen on a pink chair, its back to the camera. The cat jumps onto the chair and looks back at the camera. The woman picks up her phone and starts taking pictures of the cat.

[8-10] Then, the camera switches to the woman sitting in front of a computer. The computer screen shows pictures of the cat, which she is concentrating on retouching with a digital tablet.
[8-10] Then, the camera switches to the woman sitting in front of a computer. The computer screen shows pictures of the cat, which she is concentrating on retouching with a digital tablet.

[10-12] Next, the scene changes to the woman walking out of the room, holding a framed photo of the cat and showing it to the camera. The camera then switches to the cat on the chair, watching this scene.

[10-12] Next, the scene changes to the woman walking out of the room, holding a framed photo of the cat and showing it to the camera. The camera then switches to the cat on the chair, watching this scene.

[12-16] Subsequently, the camera switches again. The woman places the cat's photo on the floor by the wall. The white cat is comfortably lying on the pink chair, creating an interesting contrast with the cat in the photo. The cat lies lazily on the chair, now wearing a simple white crown on its head, and sticks out its tongue to lick its mouth.
